title: LF Older players who play for fun
body:
Looking for a couple of peeps over the age of idk.. 25? I'm interested in playing some league games with friends and I am pretty new. Keen on learning mechanics, don't care how good you are at all and don't care about winning. 

Add me to friends if you think we'd have a good time.

replies.body:
sup man, i qualify for over the age of 25 i guess, feel free to add me.

i kinda get half the champs, the other half is up in the air.
